meanings.definition: To put money into something in order to earn a profit or interest.
meanings.sent1: I will invest my savings in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: It is wise to invest in a diverse portfolio for financial security.
meanings.sent3: I decided to invest in a magic bean business, hoping for a giant beanstalk!
meanings.sent4: She invested her time in learning a new skill, and now she excels.
meanings.sent5: Investing in education is like planting seeds for a fruitful future.

meanings.definition: To devote time, effort, or resources to a particular undertaking.
meanings.sent1: He chose to invest his weekend in volunteering at the animal shelter.
meanings.sent2: Investing in building strong relationships is essential for a happy life.
meanings.sent3: I decided to invest in becoming a professional juggler, just for fun!
meanings.sent4: She invested all her energy into the project, and it paid off.
meanings.sent5: Investing time in self-care is crucial for overall well-being.

meanings.definition: To clothe or cover with a garment.
meanings.sent1: The knight will invest himself in shining armor for battle.
meanings.sent2: It is customary to invest the newborn in a soft blanket.
meanings.sent3: I decided to invest the scarecrow in a fancy suit for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: She will invest the statue in a beautiful robe for the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: Investing the doll in a pretty dress made it look adorable.
